titles.title: Dragon Collection
ドラゴンコレクション
龙收藏

anime.description: Through an unexpected turn of events, an ordinary elementary school student, http://anidb.net/ch65720 [Enryuu Hiro], finds himself in the world of the Dragon Collection game. This is a world called Dragon Earth, where gods, humans, and monsters exist side by side. Those who roam this world using a magic book, called a Grimoire, and cards to summon monsters and search for treasures that bear the powers of dragons are called Dracolle Battlers. Despite his bewilderment, Hiro becomes a Dracolle Battler and, together with the friends he meets there, begins his adventure to become a legendary Dragon Master! Source: Crunchyroll

externalentity.identifier: ドラゴンコレクション

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: proxy battles
tag.description: In our terms, a proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode. Often the training aspect is also involved, or in some cases the proxies are nothing more than holographic representatives of some other variation of competition (like for example a card game). While many popular shounen anime fit under this category, it`s not limited to shounen anime.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: マイセン城のタコ退治!
Octopus Extermination at Mysen Castle!
Mysen-jou no Tako Taiji!
episode.summary: Hiro and Shin safely arrive at Mysen Castle{town?}, and end their escort of the peddlers. While sightseeing around the castle, they meet a girl named Yuna who is being chased by soldiers for stealing a treasure. Moved by her story of stealing the treasure to help her sick parents, Hiro and Shin volunteer to exterminate the Kraken, who possesses the same treasure and haunts the castle floodgates. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: また1人ヘンなのが来た!
Yet Another Weirdo Has Arrived!
Mata Hitori Hen na no ga Kita!
episode.summary: Hiro and Shin splendidly defeat the Nidhogg and receive a warm reception from the village. Next they are asked to escort a group of peddlers from Mino Village to Mysen Town. On the way, Meat-Mania comes attacking. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヘンなのが来た!
A Weirdo Has Arrived!
Hen na no ga Kita!
episode.summary: After Hiro barely beats Meat-Mania in battle, a DraColle Battler named Shin appears before him. The two kindred spirits decide to journey together! While visiting Mino Village, Hiro and Shin inadvertently eat at a restaurant when they don’t have money. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なにこれ!? ドラコレ!
What`s Going On!? DraColle!
Nani Kore!? Dorakore!
episode.summary: When our protagonist, Hiro, is about to play his first game of DraColle, he is suddenly sucked into the game machine, and wakes up in the game world of Dragon Earth! After a course of events, Hiro rescues a monster called a Drake Puppy, and ends up fighting with the thief Meat-Mania. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 合成? なにそれ!?
Combination? What`s That!?
Gousei? Nani Sore!?
episode.summary: Shin and Hanicchi help Rei turn around his battle against the Kraken with a little combining! Afterwards, Rei joins Shin and Hiro on their journey, but before they can celebrate with a good meal, a Monster Griffin attacks! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 走れ! ヒロ&レイ!
Run! Hiro and Rei!
Hashire! Hiro & Rei!
episode.summary: After Rubica leaves our heroes tied up and hanging (again), a villager saves them from an approaching monster. However, this rescue comes at a price: he wants them to exterminate a monster that`s blocking the villagers from their food supply, and keeps the ill Shin behind as collateral. Hurry, guys! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナニダス? モンスダス!
What`s That? A Monster Dispenser!
Nani Dasu? MonsDis!
episode.summary: Now that Hiro can finally Fire Drake, their feud with Meatmania heads for an explosive end! After getting new cards from the castle`s Monster Dispenser, the three learn that there`s more to the Green Pepper Gang than just Meatmania - and appearances can be deceiving... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あくまでしつこいシシトウ団!
The Endlessly Pesky Green Pepper Gang!
Akuma de Shitsukoi Shishi Tou Dan!
episode.summary: As our heroes are tied up with vultures circling, Yuna comes to the rescue - though in rather unorthodox fashion. Before long they get another chance to fight Meatmania! Can Hiro summon a Fire Drake this time and truly join in the battle? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遭難者がいるそうなんです!
Looks Like a Traveler in Trouble!
Sounansha ga Irusou Nandesu!
episode.summary: An encounter with a lone stranger in the desert leads to new adventures for our heroes, including another showdown with Rubica and the Green Pepper Gang! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 船長は臭かった!?
The Captain Stinks?!
Senchou wa Kusakatta!?
episode.summary: After Captain Karubora is arrested, our heroes are rewarded with his ship. They need a captain to help them sail it, but nobody wants to go to Raniaza Island! Juliet suggests an old friend, but will he accept the job despite a sailing trauma in his past? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 若様とイカサマ!?
The Young Master and the Slick Trickster?!
Wakasama to Ika-sama!?
episode.summary: Our heroes arrive in the port town of Calonima, ready to set sail for adventure! Unfortunately, there`s a giant sea monster keeping all ships away from the port! Well, except for Captain Karubora`s ship - seems a little fishy... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シシトウ団をぶっつぶせ!
Smash the Green Pepper Gang!
Shishi Tou Dan o Buttsubuse!
episode.summary: After Hiro narrowly escapes death by cliff-fall, our heroes infiltrate the Green Pepper Gang`s stronghold! It all comes down to a three vs. one battle against the big boss Mara, but his single card won`t be easy to beat... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魔のビミョーダ・トライアングル!
The Evil Bizarreda Triangle!
Ma no Bimyouda Triangle!
episode.summary: Hiro and friends have set sail for Raniaza Island with Captain Schiff (and Yuna)! But the dreaded Bizarreda Triangle is on the way, and it won`t be that easy to avoid... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海賊王ドック・ロー!
Pirate King Doc Rowe!
Kaizoku-ou Doc Rowe!
episode.summary: Hiro and friends board the ghost ship, only to find it crewed by pirate skeletons who continue to seek treasure even after death! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キャプテンユートの野望!
Captain Yut`s Ambition!
Captain no Yabou!
episode.summary: Our heroes finally arrive at Raniaza Island, only to find more trouble than treasure! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 俺vsオレ!?
Me Versus Me!?
Ore vs Ore!?
episode.summary: After helping the islanders, Hiro and friends are permitted to enter the cave of many treasures! But, they`re going to need help from some familiar faces in order to find them... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぞくぞく海賊!?
Shiver Me Timbers! Pirates?!
Zokuzoku Kaizoku!?
episode.summary: Our heroes leave the treasure cave, only to find something earth-shattering! Later, The Lanche approaches the nearest port town, but they discover that it has been taken over by Pirate Captain Yut. They agree to rescue the mayor and save the townspeople; Yuna offers to help out too, but she may have ulterior motives... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 合体ありえないんですけどぉ~!
Fusion? I Don`t Believe It!
Gattai Arienaindesukedo!!
episode.summary: Our heroes have a tough battle to save Biliora`s mayor and the captured Yuna! However, Shin`s monster isn`t quite up to it. Hanicchi introduces fusion-combining, which makes a monster new as well as improved! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コ・ウタ・マーラの大逆襲!
Co Uta Mara Strikes Back Big-Time!
Co Uta Mara no Daigyakushuu!
episode.summary: With Port Biliora freed, it`s time for our three heroes to begin their overland journey to Dragonia. But as they bid farewell to Captain Schiff and The Lanche, Captain Yut suddenly shows up with Co Uta Mara and a terrifying superweapon! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さらば, ランシェ号!
Farewell, Lanche
Saraba, Lanche Gou!
episode.summary: After a successful test fire, Captain Yut feeds the Arcannon to make it powerful enough to destroy Port Biliora! Can our heroes on the Lanche stop him before it`s too late? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おおっと, 王都に着いちゃった!
Uh-Oh, We`re in Ohto!
Ootto, Outo ni Tsuichatta!
episode.summary: With just one day`s walk left to get to Ohto, Hiro and friends run into a couple of strange characters, and learn about the Dragonia Battler Tournament soon to take place. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇のグリモア!
The Darkness Grimoire!
Yami no Grimoire!
episode.summary: A hostile being challenges Hiro and friends, revealing the existence of a mysterious dark grimoire... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドラゴニアバトルトーナメント!
Dragonia Battle Tournament!
Dragonia Battle Tournament!
episode.summary: Upon entering the Dragonia Battle Tournament, Hiro and friends face familiar enemies - and a most unexpected challenge! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さらば, レイ!
Farewell, Rei!
Saraba, Rei!
episode.summary: Hiro and Shin advance to Round Two of the tournament for some real DraColle Battles! How will Hiro fare against the certain winner, Chiffon? And how will Rei`s wounded pride cope with missing the first quiz question? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パピー? パピパピ!
Papi? Papi Papi!
Papi? Papipapi!
episode.summary: We see the end of Shin`s battle against Rubica, and the start of Dragonia Battle Tournament Round 3! Meanwhile, there are some suspicious goings-on in the castle... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウソ!? シンが進化!?
No Way?! Shin Evolves?!
Uso!? Shin ga Shinka!?
episode.summary: During his tough battle with Gelmen, Shin discovers a hidden strength! Meanwhile, Hiro`s up against the powerful and mysterious Masked Battler! Who is that guy, anyway? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 燃えろ! ミートマニア!
Burn Up! Meatmania!
Moero! Meatmania!
episode.summary: First, reformed vegetarian Meatmania fights creepy Marmott! Then, during the leadup to Hiro and Shin`s semifinal battle, Yuna uncovers a sinister conspiracy... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウソ!? ヒロも進化!?
No Way! Hiro Evolves, Too?!
Uso!? Hiro mo Shinka!?
episode.summary: It`s time for friends Hiro and Shin to battle in the semifinals! But, how can Hiro`s Blaze Fighter stand a chance against Shin`s newly-evolved Forest Warrior? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘! 炎の決勝バトル!
Fierce Fight! The Flame-Filled Final Round!
Gekitou! En no Kesshou Battle!
episode.summary: For the final round of the tournament, Hiro faces a ferocious battle against the cruel Marmott! Meanwhile, the others trace the mysterious jar to an unexpected location. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヤバコレ! 邪神復活!?
This Is Bad! Rebirth of the Evil God?!
Yabakore! Jashin Fukkatsu!?
episode.summary: Hiro is exhausted and down to one monster against Marmott`s three! Meanwhile, Arcally is about to summon something terrifying in the Jimanpa forest! Will this episode bring us triumph, or tragedy?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 3つの祭壇? 謎のメッセージ!
Three Altars? A Puzzling Message!
Mittsu no Saidan? Nazo no Message!
episode.summary: After leaving the Kingdom of Dragonia, the three boys and Yuna discover some mysterious clues that the world is in great peril. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぷんすか! プンスカ! パピ!
Peeved! Peeved! Papi!
Punsuka! Punsuka! Papi!
episode.summary: While crossing an immense field of grass on the way to the three altars, our heroes run into a tough-talking opponent! Papi, completely fed up with how Hiro won`t summon him to battle anymore, sneaks away during the excitement. Can Hiro re-find his first friend, after taking him for granted? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キレてます! サイドチェスト!?
So Ripped! Side Chest?!
Kiretemasu! Side Chest!?
episode.summary: The gang follow Papi`s tracks across the desert, but they lead to Aebima and his well-defined musculature instead! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ビックリ! これが鍵!?
Shock! This Is the Key?!
Bikkuri! Kore ga Kagi!?
episode.summary: Yuna uses her vast treasure-hunting experience to lead the party safely past numerous traps inside the pyramid. Deep within, they discover... an altar, maybe? But how will they ever find its key? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海底神殿で大バトル!
Big Battle at the Undersea Temple!
Kaitei Shinden de Dai Battle!
episode.summary: Our heroes manage to enter the Undersea Temple, but Kageiso isn`t going to let them reach the Water Altar without a fight... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なぜ吾輩だけピンと来ないのだ!?
Why Don`t I Get a Hunch?!
Naze Wagahei Dake Pin to Konai no Da!?
episode.summary: Rei boldly leads the gang to the Water Altar — even though he has no idea where it is... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウフ♥永遠の17歳!
Tee-Hee! I`m Forever Seventeen!
Ufu Eien no 17-sai!
episode.summary: The gang arrives at a castle hidden in the forest, where Shin says the Forest Altar lies. However, the crafty witch Mansa follows them there, with a cunning plan to nab the altar key. Can our heroes outwit her? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おいらの母ちゃん!
It`s My Ma!
Oira no Kaa-chan!
episode.summary: After successfully defeating the ghost that tried to scare them away from the Wangae Forest, the party gets a surprise visitor: Shin`s mother! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激白! ユナのヒ・ミ・ツ!
Forced Confession! It`s Yuna`s Secret!
Gekishiro! Yuna no Himitsu!
episode.summary: Yuna finally comes clean on the reason for her obsessive treasure hunting! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜の翼は燃えているか!?
The Dragon Wing Is Burning?!
Ryuu no Tsubasa wa Moete Iruka!?
episode.summary: Old friends and former enemies join forces with our heroes to battle Co Uta Mara`s gang on the Dragon Wing coast! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 教えて! ナスターシャ!
Tell Us, Nastasya!
Oshiete! Nastasya!
episode.summary: Dastardly pirate Captain Yut has approached The Lanche! He can`t be up to anything good, can he? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドコソレ? タルタロスの門!
Where`s That? The Tartarus Gate!
Dokosore? Tartarus no Mon!
episode.summary: As our heroes try to determine where the Papis have been taken, Arcally`s group advances their evil scheme. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マジ!? レイも進化!?
Really?! Rei Evolves, Too?!
Maji!? Rei mo Shinka!?
episode.summary: Hiro and friends have left the forest, only to be ambushed by the Arrabbiata Gang! Can they withstand the monster-obliterating power of Jean`s Guts Bomber?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 発進! ダークスカル号!
Set Sail! Darkskull!
Hasshin! Darkskull Gou!
episode.summary: After leaving the fight at the seashore, Hiro`s group must pass through a dense forest to reach the Tartarus Gate! Meanwhile, Captain Yut has a sinking feeling during his own battle... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 邪神! 降臨!!
The Evil God Descends!!
Jashin! Kourin!!
episode.summary: The Tartarus Gate has begun to open, releasing the Evil God! What`s going to happen to Dragon Earth?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脅威! 9体のドラゴン!!
Danger! Nine Dragons!
Kyooi! 9 Tai no Dragon!!
episode.summary: Out to rescue Papi and stop Arcally`s ritual, Hiro and friends have nearly reached the summit of Mt. Happou! But that pesky Marmott`s in their way, demanding another showdown! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドラゴンマスター!
Dragon Master!
Dragon Master!
episode.summary: In order for the Chaos God Drake to defeat the Evil God, the world needs a Dragon Master! Will Hiro be up to the task? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光臨! カオスゴッド・ドレイク!
Advent of the Chaos God Drake!
Kourin! Chaos God Drake!
episode.summary: Rei reveals his first-class idea. Will it be enough to revive the Chaos God Drake and defeat the Evil God? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 邪悪! 最凶ドラゴン!
Evil! The Wickedest Dragon!
Jaaku! Saikyou Dragon!
episode.summary: The Platinum Drake and Drake Lucifer clash atop Mt. Happou, as the Evil God looks on. Is there anything our heroes can do to improve the situation?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガクブル! 壮絶バトル!
Shudder! The Epic Battle!
Gakuburu! Souzetsu Battle!
episode.summary: The Evil God has appeared! Co Uta Mara has summoned nine monsters to defeat and make our heroes` monsters sacrifices to the Evil God! How can Hiro and friends withstand such overwhelming power? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガッツだぜ! ミートマニア!
Time for Guts! Meatmania!
Guts Daze! Meatmania!
episode.summary: So long as DraColle exists, I, Naviko, will practice the way of commentary! Source: crunchyroll
